name: WBMSmart
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can connect WBM Smart Home Appliances in high security environment through Alexa with a simple command. 

Smart Home Products are designed to work with Amazon Alexa to provide you with highly efficient voice control over your home appliances in an easy way. 

It enables you to command Alexa to “turn on light” “turn off light” or “dim the light” on our devices.Here is how to connect Alexa with WBM Smart products.
 
Step(i) Download “WBM Smart” App for your Android or IOS mobile devices.
Step(ii) Register your account WBM Smart App.
Step(iii)You will need any WBM Smart device to complete the setup.
Step(iv) Configure your desired WBM Smart device in WBM Smart mobile App, change the name as per requirements to use in WBM Smart Skills.
Step(v) Now Download Amazon “Alexa App” for Android or IOS mobile device.
Step(vi) Configure Echo with Alexa App as per your requirements.
Step(vii) Now search “WBM Smart” skill from Alexa App skill category.
Step(viii) Enable Skills of “WBM Smart”, that will open “Login Page”
Step(ix) Enter your WBM Smart User name and Password that will show the confirmation of success.
Step(x) Congratulation, your Setup is complete and you can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like shown here.

“Alexa turn on the living room light”
“Alexa turn off the living room light”
“Alexa turn on bedroom air conditioner”
“Alexa turn off bed room air conditioner”
“Alexa turn on living room heater” 

This skill currently support 
smart bulbs, 
smart switches
smart socket.
